Kirsten Gillibrand , who was present for the eye opening, said: It was raw courage. It was raw strength. It was so beautiful and so moving. Doctors have also helped Gabrielle Giffords sit up and dangle her legs from her bed. She's able to open her right eye, even though it's bandaged. The next milestone will be removing her breathing tube,

group pleading for Sue to join the' X Factor' panel- and Jane Lynch agrees her character would make a`` fantastic'' judge, though she would probably clash with Simon Cowell . I think she'd be fantastic- and there would be a few contestants reduced to tears.`` It can never happen, though.
